privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.content:
# ASPRI Privacy Policy

**Last Updated:** August 14, 2025

ASPRI (AI Personal Assistant) is committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your data when you use our services.

## 1. Information We Collect

### 1.1 Google Account Information
When you sign in with Google, we collect:
- Your Google account ID
- Name and email address
- Profile picture (if available)
- Google OAuth tokens for accessing authorized services

### 1.2 Google Services Data
With your explicit consent, we may access:
- **Google Contacts**: To help you search and manage your contacts through our AI assistant
- **Gmail (Read-only)**: To provide email-related assistance and context
- **Google Calendar**: To help manage your schedule and appointments

### 1.3 Application Data
- Documents you upload for analysis and search
- Chat conversations with our AI assistant
- Financial transaction data you enter
- Configuration preferences and settings
- Usage analytics and system logs

### 1.4 Technical Information
- Device information and browser type
- IP address and general location data
- Session information and authentication tokens

## 2. How We Use Your Information

### 2.1 Core Services
- Provide AI-powered personal assistant capabilities
- Process and analyze uploaded documents
- Enable semantic search across your documents
- Manage your financial transactions and provide insights
- Facilitate contact management and search
- Provide calendar integration and scheduling assistance

### 2.2 Service Improvement
- Improve our AI models and response quality
- Enhance user experience and interface
- Analyze usage patterns for feature development
- Provide customer support and troubleshooting

### 2.3 Security and Compliance
- Authenticate users and prevent unauthorized access
- Detect and prevent fraud or abuse
- Comply with legal obligations and requests
- Maintain service security and data integrity

## 3. Data Storage and Security

### 3.1 Data Storage
- User data is stored securely in MariaDB databases
- Documents are stored in encrypted MinIO object storage
- Vector embeddings are stored in ChromaDB for search functionality
- All data is encrypted in transit and at rest

### 3.2 Security Measures
- Industry-standard encryption protocols
- Secure JWT token-based authentication
- Regular security audits and updates
- Access controls and monitoring systems
- Secure backup and disaster recovery procedures

## 4. Data Sharing and Third Parties

### 4.1 Third-Party Services
We integrate with the following services:
- **Google Services**: For authentication and authorized data access
- **Google Gemini AI**: For AI processing (data is processed but not stored by Google)
- **MinIO**: For secure document storage
- **ChromaDB**: For vector search capabilities

### 4.2 Data Sharing Policy
- We do not sell your personal information to third parties
- We do not share your data for advertising purposes
- Data may be shared only when required by law or to protect our rights
- Service providers have limited access and are bound by confidentiality agreements

## 5. Your Rights and Control

### 5.1 Access and Management
- View and download your personal data
- Update your profile and preferences
- Manage document uploads and deletions
- Control chat history and conversation data

### 5.2 Data Deletion
- Request complete account deletion at any time
- Delete specific documents or conversation history
- Revoke Google OAuth permissions
- Export your data before deletion

### 5.3 Google Data Access
- Revoke Google service permissions through your Google Account settings
- Control which Google services ASPRI can access
- Monitor access through Google's security dashboard

## 6. Data Retention

- Account data: Retained until account deletion
- Chat history: Retained for service improvement unless deleted by user
- Documents: Retained until manually deleted by user
- Financial data: Retained for user convenience unless deleted
- System logs: Retained for 90 days for security purposes

## 7. International Data Transfers

Your data may be processed in countries outside your residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data according to applicable privacy laws.

## 8. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Significant changes will be notified through our service or via email. Continued use constitutes acceptance of updates.

## 9. Contact Information

For privacy-related questions, concerns, or requests:
- Email: aspriai.myid@gmail.com
- Subject Line: "Privacy Policy Inquiry"

For Google-specific data handling information, visit: https://policies.google.com/privacy

## 10. Legal Compliance

This Privacy Policy complies with applicable data protection regulations including GDPR, CCPA, and other regional privacy laws. We are committed to maintaining the highest standards of data protection and user privacy.

terms_of_service.content:
# ASPRI Terms of Service

**Last Updated:** August 14, 2025

Welcome to ASPRI (AI Personal Assistant). These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of our AI-powered personal assistant application and related services. By using ASPRI, you agree to these Terms.

## 1. Service Description

### 1.1 ASPRI Services
ASPRI provides an AI-powered personal assistant that offers:
- Intelligent chat interface powered by Google Gemini AI
- Document upload, processing, and semantic search
- Financial transaction tracking and management
- Google Services integration (Contacts, Gmail, Calendar)
- Secure data storage and user authentication
- Multi-language support and personalized responses

### 1.2 AI-Powered Features
Our service uses artificial intelligence to:
- Process and respond to natural language queries
- Analyze uploaded documents and provide insights
- Search through your personal data contextually
- Provide financial guidance and transaction categorization
- Integrate with your Google services for enhanced functionality

## 2. Eligibility and Account Requirements

### 2.1 Age Requirements
- You must be at least 18 years old to use ASPRI
- Users under 18 require explicit parental consent
- We do not knowingly collect data from children under 13

### 2.2 Account Registration
- Registration requires a valid Google account
- You must provide accurate and complete information
- You are responsible for maintaining account security
- One account per person; sharing accounts is prohibited

## 3. Acceptable Use

### 3.1 Permitted Uses
- Use ASPRI for personal productivity and organization
- Upload documents for analysis and search
- Manage financial transactions and data
- Access integrated Google services as authorized
- Communicate with our AI assistant for legitimate purposes

### 3.2 Prohibited Activities
- Upload illegal, harmful, or copyrighted content without permission
- Use the service for fraudulent or deceptive purposes
- Attempt to reverse engineer or hack our systems
- Share account credentials or access tokens
- Use the service to harass, threaten, or harm others
- Generate or share inappropriate, offensive, or harmful content
- Violate any applicable laws or regulations

## 4. Data and Privacy

### 4.1 Your Data
- You retain ownership of all data you provide
- We process your data according to our Privacy Policy
- You can delete your data and account at any time
- We use your data only to provide and improve our services

### 4.2 Google Services Integration
- Google data access requires your explicit authorization
- You can revoke permissions through your Google Account settings
- We access only the minimum data necessary for functionality
- Google's terms and privacy policies also apply to their services

### 4.3 AI Processing
- Your conversations may be processed by Google Gemini AI
- AI processing helps improve response quality and relevance
- We do not use your data to train external AI models
- Sensitive data is handled with additional security measures

## 5. Service Availability and Modifications

### 5.1 Service Availability
- We strive for high service availability but cannot guarantee 100% uptime
- Scheduled maintenance will be announced in advance when possible
- We are not liable for service interruptions beyond our control

### 5.2 Service Modifications
- We may modify, update, or discontinue features with notice
- Significant changes will be communicated to users
- Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance

## 6. Financial Features

### 6.1 Financial Data
- Financial tracking features are for personal use only
- We do not provide financial advice or recommendations
- You are responsible for the accuracy of financial data entered
- We are not liable for financial decisions based on our analysis

### 6.2 No Financial Services
- ASPRI is not a financial institution or advisor
- We do not handle actual money or financial transactions
- Seek professional advice for important financial decisions

## 7. Intellectual Property

### 7.1 Our Rights
- ASPRI platform, code, and branding are our intellectual property
- You may not copy, modify, or distribute our proprietary technology
- Our AI models and algorithms are protected trade secrets

### 7.2 User Content
- You retain rights to content you upload or create
- You grant us limited rights to process and store your content
- You must have rights to any content you upload
- We respect intellectual property rights and respond to valid claims

## 8. Limitation of Liability

### 8.1 Service Limitations
- ASPRI is provided "as is" without warranties
- We do not guarantee accuracy of AI responses or analysis
- We are not liable for decisions made based on our service
- Our liability is limited to the maximum extent permitted by law

### 8.2 AI Responses
- AI responses are generated automatically and may contain errors
- Do not rely solely on AI advice for critical decisions
- Verify important information through additional sources
- We are not responsible for consequences of AI-generated content

## 9. Account Management

### 9.1 Account Suspension
We may suspend or terminate accounts for:
- Violation of these Terms
- Suspected fraudulent or harmful activity
- Extended periods of inactivity
- Legal requirements or court orders

### 9.2 Account Deletion
- You may delete your account at any time
- Account deletion removes all associated data
- Some data may be retained for legal or security purposes
- Deletion is irreversible after the retention period

## 10. Dispute Resolution

### 10.1 Contact First
- Contact us at aspriai.myid@gmail.com for any issues
- We will work to resolve disputes amicably
- Most issues can be resolved through direct communication

### 10.2 Legal Disputes
- These Terms are governed by applicable local laws
- Disputes will be resolved through appropriate legal channels
- You agree to pursue individual claims, not class actions

## 11. Updates and Communication

### 11.1 Terms Updates
- We may update these Terms periodically
- Significant changes will be notified via email or service
- Continued use constitutes acceptance of updates

### 11.2 Service Communications
- We may send service-related notifications
- Marketing communications require your consent
- You can opt out of non-essential communications

## 12. Contact Information

For questions about these Terms:
- Email: aspriai.myid@gmail.com
- Subject Line: "Terms of Service Inquiry"

For technical support:
- Email: aspriai.myid@gmail.com

For more information about Google's terms: https://policies.google.com/terms

By using ASPRI, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy.
